name: Humanter
description:
This game was made in the Mini Jam 40: Hunters. Made in 3 days under 45 hours work time. I made it all by myself, the only asset I used was smoke particles. Sound effects and music from "https://freesound.org/". Everything else was made within the game jam's time frame. That is my first game jam. Enjoy!

There might be some problems with the achievement system (I haven't tested it yet) (Achievements should be white when you achieve them and red when you haven't achieved them). Report anything that seems like a bug in the comments of the game or email me on support_baiji@gmail.com. I do check every email! Please give feedback!

(best on screen resolution 16:9)
